title: Calories in a Halo Orange
meta_description: Discover calories in a halo orange, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per fruit.
assumptions: Average Halo orange (mandarin/clementine variety, ~74 g edible portion), fresh, peeled, no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels for packaged products when available.

quick_answer.text: One Halo orange provides ~47 kcal, mostly from natural sugars and carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a halo orange?
faqs.a: About 47 kcal for one average fresh Halo orange.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a halo orange?
faqs.a: Approximately 11.7 g total carbs, including 1.8 g fiber and 9.4 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a halo orange low in fat and protein?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.3 g fat and 0.8 g protein per orange.

faqs.q: How does halo orange nutrition compare to regular orange?
faqs.a: Similar to a small mandarin; lower calories than a full navel orange (~62 kcal for 131 g).

faqs.q: Are halo oranges good for fiber intake?
faqs.a: Yes, one provides 1.8 g fiber, aiding digestion and satiety.
